nodes.title: Understand the concept of Retrieval Augmented Generation
nodes.desc: Recognize the role of retrieval mechanisms in augmenting generation models, enabling them to retrieve and utilize relevant information from external knowledge sources. [arxiv](https://arxiv.org/abs/2002.08909)

nodes.title: Familiarize yourself with the basics of natural language processing
nodes.desc: Grasp the fundamental concepts of NLP, including text preprocessing, tokenization, and language modeling. [stanford](https://nlp.stanford.edu/courses/ling289/)

nodes.title: Implement RAG models using popular libraries
nodes.desc: Learn to implement RAG models using popular libraries like PyTorch, TensorFlow, or Hugging Face Transformers. [huggingface](https://huggingface.co/transformers/)

nodes.title: Experiment with different RAG architectures
nodes.desc: Investigate the effects of different retriever, generator, and ranker architectures on the performance of RAG models. [github](https://github.com/huggingface/transformers/tree/master/examples/research_projects/retrieval-augmented-generation)

nodes.title: Evaluate RAG models using various metrics
nodes.desc: Learn to evaluate RAG models using metrics like perplexity, BLEU score, and ROUGE score. [aclweb](https://www.aclweb.org/anthology/2020.acl-main.355/)

nodes.title: Join online communities and forums
nodes.desc: Participate in online discussions and forums related to RAG models, NLP, and AI to stay updated and learn from others. [reddit](https://www.reddit.com/r/NLP/)

nodes.title: Attend conferences and workshops
nodes.desc: Attend conferences and workshops related to NLP and AI to learn from experts and network with peers. [aclweb](https://www.aclweb.org/conferences/)

nodes.title: Read books and tutorials on RAG models
nodes.desc: Learn from books and tutorials that provide in-depth explanations of RAG models and their applications. [amazon](https://www.amazon.com/s?k=retrieval+augmented+generation)

nodes.title: Take online courses on RAG models
nodes.desc: Take online courses that cover RAG models, NLP, and AI to gain a deeper understanding of the subject. [coursera](https://www.coursera.org/courses?query=retrieval+augmented+generation)

nodes.title: Learn about language models
nodes.desc: Study the architecture and training of language models, such as transformer-based models like BERT and RoBERTa. [huggingface](https://huggingface.co/transformers/)

nodes.title: Understand the limitations of traditional language models
nodes.desc: Recognize the limitations of traditional language models in generating coherent and informative text, particularly when faced with out-of-vocabulary words or rare events. [aclweb](https://www.aclweb.org/anthology/W19-2306/)

nodes.title: Learn about retrieval mechanisms
nodes.desc: Study the different types of retrieval mechanisms, including information retrieval, question answering, and knowledge graph-based approaches. [sigir](https://sigir.org/)

nodes.title: Familiarize yourself with the concept of knowledge graphs
nodes.desc: Understand the structure and applications of knowledge graphs, which represent entities and their relationships in a graph format. [wikidata](https://www.wikidata.org/)

nodes.title: Study the architecture of Retrieval Augmented Generation models
nodes.desc: Learn about the different components of RAG models, including the retriever, generator, and ranker. [arxiv](https://arxiv.org/abs/2002.08909)

nodes.title: Understand the training process of RAG models
nodes.desc: Learn about the training objectives, optimization methods, and evaluation metrics used for RAG models. [aclweb](https://www.aclweb.org/anthology/2020.acl-main.355/)

nodes.title: Explore applications of RAG models
nodes.desc: Investigate the various applications of RAG models, including text generation, question answering, and conversational AI. [arxiv](https://arxiv.org/abs/2009.01725)

nodes.title: Read research papers on RAG models
nodes.desc: Stay updated with the latest research and advancements in RAG models, including new architectures, training methods, and applications. [arxiv](https://arxiv.org/search/?query=retrieval+augmented+generation)
